document_data.name: New Beacon Lighthouse
document_data.mainbody: The '''New Beacon Lighthouse''' was a new structure erected in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] following that city's destruction in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
document_data.Location: The lighthouse stood on the south bank of the [[River Tesh]] outside of the northeastern wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]].
document_data.Description: The New Beacon Lighthouse stood {{SI|120|ft|long=yes}} tall. The lens was [[enchanted]] with a ''[[continual light]]'' [[spell]] that could be seen for miles.
document_data.History: The lighthouse was constructed in just two months using large stone blocks recovered from the siege.
document_data.Defenses: A squad of four [[Zhentilar]] soldiers was stationed in the lighthouse. Two guards were always on lookout dutyâ€“one facing the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] and the other facing upriver of the River Tesh. The remaining two guarded the main door.
